name: SocialPaint
description:
Paint with multiplayer.

The players' task is to draw something on a topic randomly chosen by the game, and then evaluate their opponents' works and earn points.

The game was made in Godot 4.0 stable.

Due to an engine bug, it doesn't work well on macOS under any browser. It doesn't work on iOS web browsers too.

https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/70691
